title: Security Camera Video and Staff Reference Request

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Washington Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

Security camera video from 2/4/2026, between 8AM and 9AM PST, covering the exterior doorway colloquially referred to as the "band door" at Mt. View High School (as it is located close to the band area, and is used with permission for Period 0 students attending Jazz Band class), during the time in which Troy O'Dell, Councillor at Mt. View High School, stopped a student, raised his voice, yelled and gestured aggressively, for an extended period of time; if audio is available, audio should also be included.  The doorway in question contains signage stating that parents and visitors are not permitted entry at the door; I believe the door is to the west/northwest side of the building and is adjacent to rear parking.

I further request any an all communications between administrative staff, teachers and  other employees of Evergreen Public Schools that reference any complaints levied by parents, students or employees, against Troy O'Dell.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Lyonell D. Keplar
